column5: hey folks,  just sittin here, being bored and such. just wondering if anyone could point me into the direction of a lake/pond that i could get to from town here (sault ste. marie)... i live in the west end right by goulais ave. im not picky about the species just want somewhere to go (preferably somthin edible). my sleds are deffinately capable of breaking trails.  thanks, JP
Bout all you can do is leighs bay for whitefish

another question is, do you know of any other lakes up along the windmills and such? i got told last year that the windmill roads they made go into some ponds with decent specks, wether or not thats true..... who knows.
There is one nice little lake back there but I thinks its private. The snowmobile trail crosses a couple that I have seen holes drilled on..could be the same one. You gotta do some exploring
ya thats true, i've wasted some valuble gas so far drilling into what i thought were small lakes but turned out to be marshes haha!
i drove up from town line to prince lake last night and drove back this morning, all i seen were some crap ponds, nothing fishable
